page.title: 17Trade in the Felton Area
page.content: Several small businesses have developed in this area. A stock lorry for conveying animals is housed at Felton Stone Farm. There are also two catering establishments run from private houses in Felton. At Burley Gate there are two garages which carry out Ministry of Transport tests and general repairs to local cars and machinery. Two shops at Burley Gate (one attached to the Post Office, the other to a garage) supply any groceries and general household items. A herb farm has been established at Ocle Pychard, where locally grown herbs are freeze dried and packaged. They are distibuted to various retailers throughout the country. Milk is delivered from Hereford to the door and a baker travels around the area. A drinks and beer lorry comes once a week.
